backend/main.mo: Defines the canister's data models and storage maps for vehicles, promotions, testimonials, blog posts, contacts, media, interactions, and includes admin authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping features to related source files, components, and test IDs for build verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of several frontend page and component files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining global theme variables and light/dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/admin/AdminGuard.tsx: Protects admin routes by verifying Internet Identity login and admin permissions before rendering children.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Provides the admin panel layout with a sidebar navigation menu and logout handling.
Internet Identityâ€“based admin login page that redirects authenticated admins to the dashboard.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminProfilePag: Allows admins to view and update their profile data via form fields with save functionality.
frontend/src/admin/pages/BlogAdminPage.t: Displays blog post count and placeholder for CRUD with a button to add posts.
frontend/src/admin/pages/DashboardPage.t: Fetches multiple datasets and shows a grid of statistical summary cards.
Shows contact and credit simulation lead counts in tabbed sections with placeholders.
frontend/src/admin/pages/MediaManagerPag: Shows media asset count with a button to upload and placeholder for gallery.
frontend/src/admin/pages/PromotionsAdmin: Displays promotion count and an add button with placeholder CRUD area.
frontend/src/admin/pages/TestimonialsAdm: Shows testimonial count with button to add and placeholder CRUD interface.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VehiclesAdminPa: Displays vehicle count with add button and placeholder for CRUD features.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VisitorStatsAdm: Fetches and displays visitor statistics in a grid layout.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up all public and admin routes using TanStack Router and wraps pages with appropriate layouts and guards.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Handles contact form submission, validation, and sending contact data via mutation.
frontend/src/components/forms/CreditSimu: Manages credit simulation form submission with validation and mutation to backend.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders footer with contact info, social links, and live visitor stats.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Defines public site layout with navbar, hero, footer, CTA sections, and visitor tracking.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Mobile bottom CTA bar offering call, WhatsApp, credit form, and menu sheet access.
frontend/src/components/navigation/MainM: Bottom sheet mobile menu listing navigation links and closing on selection.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Navba: Responsive navbar with logo, nav links, WhatsApp button, and mobile slide-out menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/BottomC: CTA section prompting users to contact via WhatsApp with styled button.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Simple hero banner with title and subtitle on a red background.
frontend/src/components/vehicles/Vehicle: Displays vehicle image, details, price, feature badges, and consult/detail actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages creation and refreshing of backend actor based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data like vehicles and promotions.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisitorTracking.ts: Tracks unique visitors and page views using mutation hooks and session storage.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with extensive CSS variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post with SEO updates, loading states, and full post content.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Lists all blog posts with images and previews, linking to individual post pages.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehicleDeta: Shows detailed info for a commercial vehicle with pricing, features, likes, and share options.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehiclesPag: Displays commercial vehicles grouped into Light Duty, Medium Duty, and Tractor Head categories.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form along with contact info, map location, and sales consultant details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with banners, featured vehicles, search, about section, and latest blog posts.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehicleDetai: Shows detailed info for a passenger vehicle with variants, pricing, likes, and share features.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehiclesPage: Lists all passenger vehicles in a grid layout.
frontend/src/pages/PromoPage.tsx: Displays current promotions with images, descriptions, and terms.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Renders a testimonials grid fetched via useGetTestimonials, showing loading state, star ratings, and fallback images.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading/storing URL parameters and session-backed persistence with hash/query support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing architecture, features, image requirements, and known issues.
